EmailTemplate.name: PRM ARR NDAC Offer and Order - Completed
EmailTemplate.subject: NDAC Offer and Order Tool
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Name},
Your access request for NDAC Offer and Order Tool (OOT) has been approved. You can now access this tool on the Nokia DAC Info Center or directly via this link. User guides to get you started can be found under “How to use” in the top-right corner of the NDAC Offer & Order Tool page. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact our Nokia Partner support desk at: partner.support@nokia.com
The Nokia Global Partner Team
